Package noteApp.model

Class Filehandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • noteApp.model.Filehandler
  • public class Filehandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Filehandler-class is responsible for saving files to the user's hard drive as well as opening them.
    Author:
    Teemu Viljanen, Nico JÃ¤rvinen, Matias Vainio

      • write

        public void write​(java.lang.String filename,
                  java.lang.String text)
        Saves a simple text-file on the user's hard drive.
        Parameters:
        filename - sets the name of the file that is to be saved
        text - sets the text that is to be saved wihin the file

      • read

        public java.lang.String read​(java.lang.String filename)
        Retrieves a simple text-file from the user's hard drive.
        Parameters:
        filename - sets the name of the file that is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        returns the text from the retrieved file

      • compressFile

        public void compressFile​(java.lang.String fileToCompress,
                         java.lang.String compressFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses a simple text-file
        Parameters:
        fileToCompress - sets the file to be compressed
        compressFile - sets the target file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - invalid path

        Parameters:

      • encodeFile

        public void encodeFile​(org.fxmisc.richtext.InlineCssTextArea area,
                       Note note,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Saves the note as a rich text file
        Parameters:
        area - text area from where the note is taken
        note - note to be saved
        name - name of file to be saved

      • decodeFile

        public void decodeFile​(org.fxmisc.richtext.InlineCssTextArea area,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Opens a rich text file onto the text area
        Parameters:
        area - text area to where the file is loaded
        name - name of file to open

      • decodeFiles

        public Note decodeFiles​(java.io.File file)
        Basically same as decodeFile(InlineCssTextArea, String).

        Opens a file from the filesystem and returns it to the caller as a Note.

        Parameters:
        file - {file} File to be opened.
        Returns:
        Note object.

      • removeFile

        public void removeFile​(Note note)
        Removes a note file from the hard drive.
        Parameters:
        note - note to be removed.
